overview: Mother Popcorn - James Brown  What's The Use Of Breaking Up - Jerry Butler  MacArthur Park - Della Reese  Yester-Me, Yester-You, Yesterday - Stevie Wonder  Nowhere To Run - Martha Reeves & The Vandellas  Nothing But Heartaches - The Supremes  Ain't That Peculiar - Marvin Gaye  Goin' To A Go-Go - Smokey Robinson & The Miracles  Don't Mess With Bill - The Marvelettes  Something About You - The Four Tops  River Deep, Mountain High - Mary Wilson  It's a Man's Man's Man's World - James Brown  Everyday People - Sly & Family Stone
title: The Giants of Black Music
